I'm someone very interested and concerned about the future of artificial intelligence, technology, and society. I have academic experience (Masters') and professional experience in AI research, software development, and data science.

::: {style="text-align: center; font-size: 1.1em; padding: 1rem 2rem; background-color: #f7fafc; margin: 2rem 0; font-style: italic;"}
Welcome to my space on the internet
:::

:::{.callout-note appearance="simple"}
**Disclaimer:** My thoughts and ideas evolve constantly. I make no promise that my posts will be consistent with each other - I expect to disagree with my past self often. After all, your past self is really a different person.
:::
